wikipedia_page.main: Paul William Sparkes (born 3 August 1960) is a male retired British swimmer. Sparkes competed in the men's 1500 metre freestyle at the 1976 Summer Olympics. At the ASA National British Championships he won the 1500 metres freestyle title  and the 200 metres butterfly title in 1977.
